original_text: Who is a wise man and endued with knowledge among you? let him shew out of a good conversation his works with meekness of wisdom.
korean_text: 너희 중에 지혜와 총명이 있는 자가 누구냐 그는 선행으로 말미암아 지혜의 온유함으로 그 행함을 보일지니라

sentences.original_text: and endued with knowledge among you?
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 중에 지식을 갖춘 자가 누구인가?

sentences.original_text: let him shew out of a good conversation
his works with meekness of wisdom.
